channel.title: Grahams Eventmanger - Not working
channel.description:
Hello I added grahams event manager and it was said it blocks nulls
This is wat happened
[code] Disconnecting bugged player null java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.logout(client.java:10592) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:384) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:376) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:259) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (*********) socket closed java.net.SocketException: socket closed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129) at client.fillInStream(client.java:9131) at client.run(client.java:18193) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Connection from *********:1815 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (**********) Connection from *******:1816 ?[/code]
As you can see it said socket closed although my other nulls still connected..? Is that supposed to happen ... i dont think so.?
Can anyone tlel me if i done anything wrong. im sure i didnt.....
Im usin delta scape...

item.title: Grahams Eventmanger - Not working
item.dc:creator: @Pheega Pheega
item.description:
@Pheega wrote:

[quote=“Kalvin, post:1, topic:282295”]Hello I added grahams event manager and it was said it blocks nulls

This is wat happened

Disconnecting bugged player null java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.logout(client.java:10592) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:384) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:376) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:259) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (*********) socket closed java.net.SocketException: socket closed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129) at client.fillInStream(client.java:9131) at client.run(client.java:18193) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Connection from *********:1815 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (**********) Connection from *******:1816 ?

As you can see it said socket closed although my other nulls still connected…? Is that supposed to happen … i dont think so.?

Can anyone tlel me if i done anything wrong. im sure i didnt…

Im usin delta scape… [/quote]The EventManager itself doesn’t block nulls (as far as I know). Graham just made a tutorial that removes thread-per-client and adds the EventManager. You should look for that tutorial instead of just for the EventManager itself.

Read full topic
